Name: John Example
Title: UFO Researcher
Scoring Notes - Transparency: Rarely cites sources or provides documentation
Scoring Notes - Sensationalism: Uses highly dramatic language and clickbait titles
Scoring Notes - Monetization: Heavy monetization through merchandise and paid content
Quote 1 Text: We have definitive proof that aliens built the pyramids
Quote 1 Context: Said during promotional tour for new book
Quote 2 Text: The government is hiding alien technology in Area 51
Quote 2 Fact Check Notes: No evidence provided to support claim

Name: Jane Researcher
Title: Former Pentagon Analyst
Scoring Notes - Evidence: Provides documented evidence and official records
Scoring Notes - Consistency: Maintains consistent position based on available data
Scoring Notes - Monetization: Minimal monetization focuses on research funding
Quote 1 Text: We observed objects exhibiting capabilities we cannot explain
Quote 1 Fact Check Notes: Corroborated by multiple witnesses and sensor data
Quote 2 Text: The stigma around reporting is changing within the military
Quote 3 Text: We need more data before drawing conclusions
Quote 3 Context: Article about scientific approach to UAP study
